parameters.description: the name of the generator to use for creating secrets
parameters.name: generatorName

operations.summary: Generate Secrets from a single generator request
operations.notes:
Creates Secrets from a single generator request, using the specified generator.
 Used by Keywhiz CLI and the web ui.

responseMessages.message: Successfully generated secrets according to the request
Malformed or incorrect request parameters provided
Request was formed correctly but was semantically incorrect

parameters.description: the name of the generator to use for creating secrets
parameters.name: generatorName

operations.summary: Generate Secrets from a batch of generator requests
operations.notes:
Creates Secrets from a batch of generator requests, using the specified generator.
 Used by Keywhiz CLI and the web ui.

responseMessages.message: Successfully generated secrets according to the request
Malformed or incorrect request parameters provided
Request was formed correctly but was semantically incorrect, batch may have been empty
